title: Wild Rose
description: Built a dynamic dashboard with React, MUI, and Supabase, featuring real-time data updates and secure user authentication.

title: Pizza Menu
description: Developed an interactive pizza menu app using React, TailwindCSS, and Redux, allowing users to customize orders easily.

title: World Wise
description: Created a travel tracker with React, Leaflet, and Three.js, featuring secure location tracking and an engaging 2D map.

title: Galaxy Generator
description: Designed an interactive galaxy generator with Three.js for a visually stunning galaxy creation experience.

title: Cynthia Ugwu
description: Cloned an Awwwards-winning site using GSAP and Three.js, demonstrating advanced animations and 3D graphics.
